title: The Rise and Fall of Vine
itunes:title: The Rise and Fall of Vine
description:
With rumors that the video app Vine is set to return, we look at Vine's history. Where did it come from? Where did it go? Did Cotton Eye Joe have anything to do with it?

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

itunes:keywords: Twitter, Vine, video, Elon Musk, TikTok, Instagram, YouTube, Snapchat, Dom Hofmann, Rus Yusupov, Colin Kroll, Intermedia Labs, Byte, Clash, Huddles
